int FileLoader::checkFileExtension ( std::string  path) [static]

Checks if the specified file has a valid file extension

Returns:
an int representing which file extension was present, if a unknown file extension was present return -1.
int FileLoader::getFileExtensionCode ( std::string  fileExtension) [static]

Get the code representing the file extension

Parameters:
fileExtensionwill be compared internally with known file extensions
Returns:
an int representing which file extension was present, if a unknown file extension was present return -1.

Loads a file, and from which creates a Scene object.

Parameters:
paththe filepath to load a file from
Returns:
A Scene containing the contents acquired from the specified file
